00048 // Assume that a class is already given for the object:
00049 //    Position with coordinates {SUMOReal x, y;}
00050 //===================================================================
00051 
00052 
00053 // isLeft(): test if a Position is Left|On|Right of an infinite line.
00054 //    Input:  three Positions P0, P1, and P2
00055 //    Return: >0 for P2 left of the line through P0 and P1
00056 //            =0 for P2 on the line
00057 //            <0 for P2 right of the line
00058 //    See: the January 2001 Algorithm on Area of Triangles
00059 
00060 
00061 inline SUMOReal
00062 isLeft(const Position& P0,
00063        const Position& P1,
00064        const Position& P2) {
00065     return (P1.x() - P0.x()) * (P2.y() - P0.y()) - (P2.x() - P0.x()) * (P1.y() - P0.y());
00066 }
00067 
00068 
00069 PositionVector
00070 simpleHull_2D(const PositionVector& V);
